snippet.title: Trailer for Locally Sourced Anthology I: A Space Atlas
snippet.description:
Locally Sourced Anthology I: A Space Atlas is a games anthology releasing on July 22nd on Steam and Itch.io featuring 8 experimental games from different indie game developers about outer space. Grow tea on the Moon! Fish on Saturn! Find love on Mars! And 5 other things!

You can check out the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2915920/Locally_Sourced_Anthology_I_A_Space_Atlas/

#indiegame #pcgaming
